name: Old Future: Post-Apocalyptic Times
description:
"OLD Future" is a SandBox post-apocalyptic survival indie game inspired by classic games we all loved growing up.
Early Access Content Completion:
In 1959 the Western Block and the Soviet Union initiated the M.A.D. (Mutually Ensured Destruction) Protocol.
A world technologically raised on the power of the Atom seised to exist in one afternoon.
You find yourself in the future looking for hidden gems in the ruins of a world long gone.
Game Features:
Inventory & gear
Crafting & survival
Modable guns, various ammo.
Traders, beasts & AI
House building, upgrades & locks
Nature biomes: Nuclear winter, Wasteland, Paradise
Multicamera & Minimap
Local & Internet Multiplayer
Friends, this is a Solo Dev project, I answer and appreciate all feedback!
Full time development of the project started in January 2021
Please join me in making this game a reality.
